channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Trump nominates State Department spokeswoman Tammy Bruce as UN deputy representative
item.description: Tammy Bruce, a U.S. State Department spokesperson, has been nominated by President Donald Trump to become the next U.N. deputy representative.

item.title: Trump says he'll turn D.C. from dangerous to safe
